overview:
Philip Ives is an entrepreneurial technologist focused on consumer applications. Philip serves as CTO for Ladies Who Launch developing their media and community platforms.

Throughout his career he has focused mass-appeal, consumer-facing applications at companies like Comcast, QVC, Traffic.com, and recently Sivoo.

In his capacity as VP of Technology, and later as CTO, Philip designed Sivoo’s video delivery platform, application architecture, and one of the first In-Stream video advertising technologies.

Prior to working at Sivoo, Philip developed the first interactive TV shopping application on WebTV at QVC, games and applications for cable set-top boxes, and an online ticketing application for Comcast-Spectacor.
